extends Object

This class control all the view game on the console.

Method Detail

askNumberOfPlayer

public int askNumberOfPlayer()
Ask to user the numbers of the players who want play game. Also read the answer. Print the ask on the stdout.

showGameState

public void showGameState(DisplayedPlayer currentPlayer,
                          DisplayedMap currentMap,
                          DisplayedTile currentTile)
Show to user a game state. It's the current player, the tile of that player and the current map. Print all on the stdout.

showFinalPoint

public void showFinalPoint(List<DisplayedPlayer> listOfPlayer)
Show to user ending points, for all players. Print all on the stdout.

Parameters:
the - players who played.

showWinner

public void showWinner(ModelPlayer winner)
Show to winner player, at the end of the game. Print this on the stdout.
